Player History
Drafted in 14th round, 209th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/20/2015, off Michael Strother (PHI)...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/11/2016 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/3/2017 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/20/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/13/2017 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Seattle to New York on 3/2/2018 (Going to SEA: P Jordan Goss. Going to NY: SS Steve Schlesinger)...
